entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is the company whose internal control over financial reporting was audited by Deloitte & Touche LLP

entities.name: DELOITTE & TOUCHE LLP
entities.description: Deloitte & Touche LLP is the independent registered public accounting firm that audited Microsoft Corporation's internal control over financial reporting as of June 30, 2021

entities.name: BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: The Board of Directors of Microsoft Corporation is addressed in the report by Deloitte & Touche LLP regarding the audit of internal control over financial reporting

relationships.relationship_description: Deloitte & Touche LLP audited the internal control over financial reporting of Microsoft Corporation as of June 30, 2021

relationships.source_entity: BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF MICROSOFT CORPORATION
